Hi, this is a comment.
To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.
This is just great! Great I say!

item.title: Blockquote
item.dc:creator: gordan
item.content:encoded: [quoterotate][quote smallprint="John Doe, site.com"]Awesome. It’s just great! A bit of tinkering and you’re all done![/quote][quote smallprint="Jane, flowers.com"]Got my whole site setup in under an hour. Superb![/quote][quote smallprint="Dan, mycars.com"]Best theme I've ever worked with. So easy to setup.[/quote][/quoterotate]
